item.title: 文件显示，OpenAI 首席执行官去年获得 76,001 美元薪酬
item.description:
这笔数额不大的资金是该非营利组织本周披露的一系列信息之一。【原文：

The modest sum was one of a number of disclosures the nonprofit made this week. 

】

item.title: 汇丰银行搁置碳信用额交易和融资计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）已放弃设立碳信用额柜台的计划，因为这家欧洲最大的银行因屡次被指控 "洗绿 "而对市场感到冷静。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc has abandoned plans to build a carbon credits desk, according to people familiar with the matter, as Europe’s biggest bank cools to a market rocked by repeated allegations of greenwashing.】

item.title: 高盛称 2025 年信贷估值不太可能降低
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US corporate bond investors will likely start 2025 with the most challenging valuation backdrop in decades, but attractive yields should keep the asset class compelling, according to analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 埃克森退出苏里南近海石油勘探区块
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司退出了苏里南沿海的一个石油勘探区块，该区块距离它在圭亚那水域发现超过 110 亿桶石油的地方不远。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. withdrew from an oil-exploration block off the coast of Suriname, not far from where it discovered more than 11 billion barrels in Guyanese waters.】

item.title: 迪尔业绩将反映农场困境，特朗普被视为不确定因素
item.description: 全球最大的农用机械制造商迪尔公司（Deere & Co.【原文：Deere & Co., the world’s biggest farm machinery maker, is set to report what could be its worst fourth quarter since 2020, wrapping up a dismal period for the sector hit by a slumping farm economy.】

item.title: 桃子房产在主要投资者的支持下开始出售股份
item.description: 业主桃子地产集团公司（Peach Property Group AG）将在四大股东的支持下启动增资，以在债务再融资前筹集新资金。【原文：Landlord Peach Property Group AG will kick off a capital increase with the backing of its four largest shareholders as it seeks to raise fresh funds ahead of a debt refinancing.】

item.title: 罗恩-巴隆的 450 亿美元公司正在 "研究 "是否推出 ETF
item.description: 在全球 14 万亿美元的交易所交易基金行业中，有一家硕果仅存的公司正在权衡是否最终加入其中。【原文：One of the last remaining holdouts to the global $14 trillion exchange-traded fund industry is weighing whether to finally join in.】

item.title: 科技驱动的股市反弹有助于稳定加州预算
item.description: 科技股的上涨为加州创造了大量财富，帮助该州充实了国库。【原文：The rally in technology stocks has created so much wealth in California that it has helped the state fill its coffers.】

item.title: 特朗普的加密货币涨势中缺少了什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 爱尔兰的马克鲁夫警告银行家在提出要求时要 "理智
item.description: 爱尔兰央行行长警告欧元区主权债务危机中心之一的银行家们，加入大西洋彼岸迫在眉睫的放松管制浪潮是危险的。【原文：Ireland’s central bank chief warned bankers in one of the epicenters of the eurozone’s sovereign-debt crisis about the perils of joining a deregulatory wave looming on the other side of the Atlantic.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯托纳拉斯预计 2025 年初实现 2% 的通胀目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，欧元区正处于通胀率持续达到 2% 的边缘，官员们有责任避免通胀率低于这一目标。【原文：The euro zone is on the cusp of sustainably reaching 2% inflation, putting the onus on officials to avoid undershooting that goal, according to European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 巴西金融科技公司 Nubank 考虑将总部迁往英国
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司 Nu Holdings Ltd. 正在考虑将其法律基地转移到英国的计划，此举将标志着英国在鼓励更多科技公司迁往英国方面取得了重大胜利。【原文：Brazilian financial-technology company Nu Holdings Ltd. is considering plans to shift its legal base to the UK, in a move that would mark a major win in Britain’s push to encourage more tech companies to move to the country.】

item.title: 调查显示，人工智能的应用迅速从 IT 扩展到人力资源和市场营销领域
item.description: 一项针对 800 名大型企业商业领袖的调查显示，在过去的一年里，生成式人工智能的使用已迅速在各类工作中普及，从信息技术扩展到人力资源等领域。【原文：The use of generative artificial intelligence has quickly become ubiquitous across various types of jobs over the past year, spreading from information technology to areas like human resources, according to a survey of 800 business leaders at large corporations.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省任命加拿大前总理哈珀监管养老金管理机构
item.description: 阿尔伯塔省政府任命加拿大前总理斯蒂芬-哈珀（Stephen Harper）领导其公共养老基金管理公司的董事会，而此前不到两周，该公司的首席执行官和所有董事均被解雇。【原文：Alberta’s government named former Canadian Prime Minister Stephen Harper to lead the board of its public pension fund manager, less than two weeks after firing its chief executive officer and every director.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉自 2019 年以来首次进入地方债务市场
item.description: 委内瑞拉五年来首次批准在当地市场出售国债，以弥补不断增加的开支并稳定汇率。【原文：Venezuela approved the sale of government debt in the local market for the first time in five years, amid an effort to cover mounting spending and stabilize the exchange rate.】

item.title: 放贷人内讧导致美国轮胎分销商面临破产风险
item.description: 美国轮胎分销商公司（American Tire Distributors Inc.【原文：A fight between lenders of American Tire Distributors Inc. over bankruptcy financing is threatening to derail the company’s path to emerge from Chapter 11.】

item.title: 美国指控五人参与 "分散蜘蛛 "黑客攻击狂潮
item.description: 根据周三公布的一份控诉书和起诉书，臭名昭著的 "散蜘蛛 "团伙的五名据称成员被美国检察官指控针对数十家公司和个人实施黑客攻击，导致敏感数据和至少 1100 万美元的加密货币被盗。【原文：Five alleged members of the notorious Scattered Spider gang were accused by US prosecutors of a hacking spree that targeted dozens of companies and individuals, resulting in the theft of sensitive data and at least $11 million in cryptocurrency, according to a complaint and indictment unsealed Wednesday.】

item.title: 洛杉矶港迎来关税前持续进口潮
item.description: 10 月份，美国最繁忙的海运贸易综合体继续运送接近创纪录水平的进口货物，因为企业在潜在的关税上调之前将货物运入，并寻求避免在备用港口出现与劳动力相关的干扰。【原文：The busiest maritime trade complex in the US continued to move near-record levels of imports in October as businesses bring goods in ahead of potential tariff increases and seek to avoid labor-related disruptions at alternate ports.】

item.title: 莫尔表示，尽管已做出努力，但停止进口俄罗斯石油仍不现实
item.description: 能源公司 Mol Nyrt.认为，对匈牙利和斯洛伐克等国来说，在未来几年内完全摆脱俄罗斯原油供应的雄心壮志是不现实的，尽管该公司为实现该地区炼油厂供应多样化做出了种种努力。【原文：Energy company Mol Nyrt. sees the ambition to completely wean Europe away from Russian crude in the next few years as unrealistic for countries like Hungary and Slovakia, despite all its efforts to diversify supplies for its refineries in the region.】

item.title: AppLovin 计划发行价值 35 亿美元的债券，首次进行高级别销售
item.description: AppLovin 公司被提升为蓝筹股后，首次进入美国投资级债券市场。【原文：AppLovin Corp. is making its debut in the US investment-grade bond market after being upgraded to blue-chip status.】

item.title: 海底电缆为何成为破坏者的诱惑目标
item.description: 海底电缆是互联网的动脉，在各大洲之间传输数据，支撑着日益数字化的经济。【原文：Subsea cables are the arteries of the internet, transmitting data between continents and underpinning an increasingly digital economy.】

item.title: Dye & Durham 在投资者拒绝交易谈判后暂停销售
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大法律软件公司 Dye & Durham Ltd. 一直受到激进投资者的压力，在其两大股东表示不会批准正在讨论的交易后，该公司暂停了出售程序。【原文：Dye & Durham Ltd., a Canadian legal software company that’s been under pressure from activist investors, has paused a sale process after two of its largest shareholders said they wouldn’t approve the deals being discussed, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 如果不确定性消除，英国央行拉姆斯登将考虑进一步降息
item.description: 英格兰银行副行长戴夫-拉姆斯登（Dave Ramsden）表示，如果未来几个月英国经济的不确定性消除，他将考虑投票支持加快降息。【原文：Bank of England Deputy Governor Dave Ramsden said he would consider voting for quicker interest rate cuts if uncertainty around the UK economy clears in coming months.】

item.title: FinThrive 再融资是一些债权人的最新优势
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，医疗保健软件公司 FinThrive 本周宣布的债务再融资包括低于面值的交换，并为精心设计该交易的债权人提供了更优惠的条件。【原文：Healthcare software company FinThrive’s debt refinancing announced this week includes below-par exchanges and sweeter terms for creditors who crafted the deal, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼敦促谨慎对待进一步降息
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）表示，她希望在进一步降息问题上谨慎行事，因为降低通胀的进展已经放缓。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman said she wants to move cautiously on further interest-rate cuts because progress in reducing inflation has slowed.】

item.title: 费城财政状况改善，S&P 公司上调费城债券评级
item.description: S&P全球公司上调了费城的信用评级，理由是该市经济反弹，并在支付工人退休基金方面取得了长足进步。【原文：Philadelphia’s credit rating was raised by S&P Global, which cited the city’s economic rebound and the strides it has made toward covering its obligations to workers’ retirement funds.】

item.title: 参议院听证会凸显中国黑客日益严重的威胁
item.description: 民主党和共和党参议员罕见地一致认为，中国国家支持的黑客问题正在恶化。但首先...【原文：In a rare bipartisan moment, Democrat and Republican senators agree the problem of Chinese state-sponsored hackers is getting worse. But first…】

item.title: 高德美支持者提议出售约 14 亿美元的股份
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的交易条款，一批高德美集团（Galderma Group AG）的股东将出让该护肤品集团 6% 的股份，价值约 12 亿瑞士法郎（14 亿美元）。【原文：A group of Galderma Group AG shareholders are offering a 6% stake in the skincare group worth around 1.2 billion Swiss francs ($1.4 billion), according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 埃及总理表示，埃及将在国际货币基金组织（IMF）项目结束前重新审视各项目标
item.description: 埃及总理穆斯塔法-马德布利（Mostafa Madbouly）表示，埃及已要求国际货币基金组织审查其 80 亿美元计划的全部期限目标。【原文：Egypt has asked the International Monetary Fund to review the targets for the full duration of its $8 billion program, Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly said.】

item.title: 参议员将就联邦调查局检查盖茨等人一事与特朗普发生冲突
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普准备跳过联邦调查局对其提名人选的审查，这将颠覆 60 多年来的先例，并使他在试图通过参议院批准其有争议的内阁人选时与自己党内的成员发生冲突。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump is poised to skip over FBI vetting of his nominees, upending more than 60 years of precedent and putting him on a collision course with members of his own party as he tries to power his controversial cabinet picks through the Senate.】
